method.name: float
method.digest: In inlet 1, sample rate reduction factor
method.description: In inlet 1, sample rate reduction factor

method.name: eval
method.description: Formula to be evaluated. Variable name must be 't'

attribute.name: red
attribute.description: Factor for sample rate reduction. The lower it is, the higher the pitch of the sound is.

attribute.name: lfo
attribute.digest: When activated, the frequency is reduced by 10x and the values are interpolated, making the output suitable for modulations
attribute.description: When activated, the frequency is reduced by 10x and the values are interpolated, making the output suitable for modulations.
